mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (ID, PWD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PIC, DATE, MODDATE, FOLLOWER, FOLLOWING, BIRTH) values (#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PWD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PIC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{MODDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, #{FOLLOWER,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{FOLLOWING,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{BIRTH,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from MEMBER where ID like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") limit ${pageNum} , 12
